comments:
Ref:  "Publishing the site to a server" section of the "How to keep up to date" 
article (http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Update/keeping-up-to-
date.html).

Reproduce:
1. install Eclipse FTP and WebDAV Support(2.1.0) as specified
2. restart workbench as prompted
3. select update site project and bring up pop-up menu
4. Team -> Target Site
5. Select either FTP or WebDAV --- both give NoClassDefFoundError
(There was probably just an issue with the installed files but I thought I 
would report here since it was an Update Test Scenario).  :)


Top of stack trace:
